name: The Amazing Spider Man 2 - Remake
description:
Explore the New York city  to its limit, and take down the enemies that lie within the shadows of the night...

The game allows you to play as the Amazing Spider Man... allowing you to explore a city full of crime and injustice... It's your job to put an stop to this.

Features 

  • Open World to explore
  • Web Swing
  • Web Zip
  • Wall Crawl
  • Combat Mode
  • Combo System
  • Procedural Missions
  • Functional NPCs
  • Collectibles
  • Progress System
  • Abstract photo mode
